$documentation.purpose: Configuration file for the Discovery phase. Defines input/output paths, project classification for artifact applicability, and checkpoint tracking.
$documentation.phase_position: Created at CP0, referenced throughout discovery

key_attributes.system_name: Name of the system being analyzed
key_attributes.project_classification.type: Project type (FULL_STACK, BACKEND_ONLY, DATABASE_ONLY, INTEGRATION, INFRASTRUCTURE)
key_attributes.project_classification.confidence: Confidence level of classification (HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW)
key_attributes.project_classification.artifact_applicab: Which artifacts apply to this project type

validation_rules: input_path MUST exist and contain client materials
project_classification.type MUST be a valid project type
artifact_applicability MUST match project type defaults unless overridden
